sentences.en: She gave us a toothless grin.
sentences.cn: 她张开没牙的嘴巴对我们笑了笑。

sentences.en: In his view, the commission remains a toothless and ineffectual body.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，委员会仍然是个没有权威而且缺乏效率的机构。

sentences.en: In 1784, five years before he became President of the United States, George Washington, 52, was nearly toothless.
sentences.cn: 1784年，也就是52岁的乔治·华盛顿当选美国总统的5年前，他几乎已经没有牙齿了。
